channel.title: Beyond Code on Stefan Lesser
channel.description: Recent content in Beyond Code on Stefan Lesser

item.title: Democratize Programming
item.description: At the end of 2016, after I had left Apple, and half-way into a year of traveling, I thought about what I wanted to tackle next and wrote down1 some big ideas that got me excited. As part of a larger document I wrote: Make Developing Software Accessible to Everyone aka “Fix software development” A lot has changed in software development over the last fifty years, but we still struggle with the same complexities.
